txt.en: 'Gammy Boggs, one of the older hobbits here in Staddle, keeps tabs on all the hobbits on the farms east of the town centre. If you find yourself on the road east, look to the north at the second farm and you'll find Gammy looking out over the rolling pipeweed farms.\n\n'She's always got something to say to passers-by and likely will want something done.'

'Redweed is such a good constable, always has a moment for Gammy, he does. I've been here since I was a little hobbit, through my tweens and on now into my older years. Seen a good crop of hobbit grown, and seen more wander into the hill overlooking Bree or down on to the Buckland or the Shire.

'Staddle is my home and I shall not leave any time. I know all the hobbits here, who has the long hair, curly hair, even the little blonde hobbit --\qhow curious,\q I said, when I seen him!

'Listen to me, prattling on.'

Watcher Redweed mentioned that one of the older hobbits, Gammy Boggs, always bends his ear about the goings-on of the farms of Staddle east of the town centre. She might know a thing or two that needs doing out near the farms.

Gammy Boggs lives on the second farm north of the road east from the centre of Staddle.\n\nConstable Redweed suggested that you speak with Gammy Boggs, if you wish to know more about what is going on in Staddle.
